para1: The BOVICOR EXPORT group is the Spanish leader in livestock exports outside the European Union. In particular, it supplies the Maghreb and Middle East market.Export of livestock from Europe and South America, animals intended for breeding, fattening or slaughter are thus exported to Turkey, Lebanon, Algeria, Tunisia, Morocco and LibyaSupport from A to Z.We take care of the animals from their loading point in the allotment centers to their final destination in the importing country.
paragraph1: The bovicor export group is the Spanish leader in the export market for live animals outside the European Union.
paragraph2: The animals are transported with the greatest care by livestock trucks to the loading port or directly to their destination.
paragraph3: All the logistics are organized so that ships can be loaded quickly. On board, specially trained crews take care of the welfare of the animals until their arrival at their destination.
par1: Best means of transportation and assured safety
par2: Very responsive and available at all times
par4: Transport deadline on time and well respected
